languages.text: "Истина открылась мне, шерин: Империум таит слишком много возможностей даже для таких, как я. Главное — знать, кому на лапу вовремя дать, кого послать, кого припугнуть, ну а кому задницу подлизать приятным словечком. Знаешь, меня все командование любило — достану им то, достану это... Ну, так вот Касбаллика меня и заприметила".

traits.locale_text: "Истина открылась мне, шерин: Империум таит слишком много возможностей даже для таких, как я. Главное — знать, кому на лапу вовремя дать, кого послать, кого припугнуть, ну а кому задницу подлизать приятным словечком. Знаешь, меня все командование любило — достану им то, достану это... Ну, так вот Касбаллика меня и заприметила".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."
languages.original_text: "Истина открылась мне, шерин: Империум таит слишком много возможностей даже для таких, как я. Главное — знать, кому на лапу вовремя дать, кого послать, кого припугнуть, ну а кому задницу подлизать приятным словечком. Знаешь, меня все командование любило — достану им то, достану это... Ну, так вот Касбаллика меня и заприметила".

traits.locale_text: "My eyes opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities even for those like myself. The trick is to know whose palms to grease, who to kick, who to intimidate and whose arse to lick. You know, the officers have always been fond of me — I could get this and procure that... And so the Kasballica took notice."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My eyes opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities even for those like myself. The trick is to know whose palms to grease, who to kick, who to intimidate and whose arse to lick. You know, the officers have always been fond of me — I could get this and procure that... And so the Kasballica took notice."

The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

traits.locale_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “于是，我的眼界被打开了，我看到了真相，亲爱的。帝国充满了机会，就算对我这样的人也不例外。诀窍在于弄清楚该去吻谁的手，该去舔谁的靴子，该去掐谁的喉咙，该去踹谁的屁股。于是，我在卫队指挥部里得到了所有人的欢迎。无论他们想要什么，我都可以帮他们弄到……于是，卡斯巴利卡注意到了我。”
languages.original_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

traits.locale_text: “于是，我的眼界被打开了，我看到了真相，亲爱的。帝国充满了机会，就算对我这样的人也不例外。诀窍在于弄清楚该去吻谁的手，该去舔谁的靴子，该去掐谁的喉咙，该去踹谁的屁股。于是，我在卫队指挥部里得到了所有人的欢迎。无论他们想要什么，我都可以帮他们弄到……于是，卡斯巴利卡注意到了我。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

languages.text: «Mis ojos están abiertos a la verdad, shereen. El Imperium está lleno de oportunidades, incluso para alguien como yo. El truco está en saber qué manos untar, qué pies besar, qué garganta estrangular y qué culo patear. Era muy popular entre el mando de la Guardia, ¿sabe? Les conseguía cosas a todos, sin importar lo que fuera... y la Kasballica se fijó en ello».
languages.original_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

traits.locale_text: «Mis ojos están abiertos a la verdad, shereen. El Imperium está lleno de oportunidades, incluso para alguien como yo. El truco está en saber qué manos untar, qué pies besar, qué garganta estrangular y qué culo patear. Era muy popular entre el mando de la Guardia, ¿sabe? Les conseguía cosas a todos, sin importar lo que fuera... y la Kasballica se fijó en ello».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしは真実に目を開かされたのよ、シャリーン。帝国はチャンスに満ちている。あたしのような人間にすらね。コツは、誰の手のひらに油を塗って、誰のブーツを舐めて、誰の喉を絞めて、誰のケツを蹴るかを知ることよ。あたしは防衛軍司令部の誰からも人気があったわ。あたしは彼らのために、彼らが望むものを何でも調達したから。だからカスバリカに気付かれてしまったの」
languages.original_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしは真実に目を開かされたのよ、シャリーン。帝国はチャンスに満ちている。あたしのような人間にすらね。コツは、誰の手のひらに油を塗って、誰のブーツを舐めて、誰の喉を絞めて、誰のケツを蹴るかを知ることよ。あたしは防衛軍司令部の誰からも人気があったわ。あたしは彼らのために、彼らが望むものを何でも調達したから。だからカスバリカに気付かれてしまったの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Mir wurden die Augen geöffnet, Shereen. Das Imperium ist voller Gelegenheiten, selbst für Leute wie mich. Der Trick ist einfach: Man muss wissen, wessen Hände man schmieren muss, wessen Stiefel lecken, wessen Kehle zudrücken, wessen Knochen brechen. Ich war bei den Befehlshabern sehr beliebt, wisst Ihr? Ich konnte Dinge für sie beschaffen, was auch immer sie wollten ... So ist die Kasballica auf mich aufmerksam geworden."
languages.original_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

traits.locale_text: "Mir wurden die Augen geöffnet, Shereen. Das Imperium ist voller Gelegenheiten, selbst für Leute wie mich. Der Trick ist einfach: Man muss wissen, wessen Hände man schmieren muss, wessen Stiefel lecken, wessen Kehle zudrücken, wessen Knochen brechen. Ich war bei den Befehlshabern sehr beliebt, wisst Ihr? Ich konnte Dinge für sie beschaffen, was auch immer sie wollten ... So ist die Kasballica auf mich aufmerksam geworden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ça m'a ouvert les yeux, shereen. L'Imperium regorge d'opportunités, même pour les petites gens comme moi. Il faut simplement savoir quelles pattes graisser, quelles bottes lécher, quelles gorges trancher et quels arrière-trains botter. J'étais dans les petits papiers des commandants de la Garde, vous voyez. Je leur procurais tout ce qu'ils voulaient... et la Kasballica a fini par le remarquer. »
languages.original_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

traits.locale_text: « Ça m'a ouvert les yeux, shereen. L'Imperium regorge d'opportunités, même pour les petites gens comme moi. Il faut simplement savoir quelles pattes graisser, quelles bottes lécher, quelles gorges trancher et quels arrière-trains botter. J'étais dans les petits papiers des commandants de la Garde, vous voyez. Je leur procurais tout ce qu'ils voulaient... et la Kasballica a fini par le remarquer. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Gerçeği görmeye başladım şirinim. İmparatorluk, benim gibilere bile ne imkânlar sunuyormuş. Mesele kimin parayla satın alınabileceğini, kimin kıçını yalayacağını, kimin boğazını sıkacağını ve suratını dağıtacağını bilmek. Muhafız komutasındaki herkesle aram iyiydi şahsen. İstedikleri her şeyi temin edebiliyordum. Kasballica da bunun farkına vardı."
languages.original_text: "My eyes were opened to the truth, shereen. The Imperium is full of opportunities, even for people like myself. The trick is knowing whose palms to grease, whose boots to lick, whose throat to squeeze, and whose arses to kick. I was very popular with everyone in the Guard command, you see — I'd procure things for them, whatever they wanted... And so the Kasballica took notice."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçeği görmeye başladım şirinim. İmparatorluk fırsatlarla dolu. Benim gibiler için bile. Mesele kimin parayla satın alınabileceğini, kimin ayakkabısını yalayacağını, kimin boğazını sıkacağını ve kimin ağzını burnunu kıracağını bilmek. Muhafız komutasındaki herkesle aram iyiydi şahsen. Onlara istedikleri her şeyi temin edebiliyordum. Kasballica da bunun farkına vardı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
